    Reference

    All functions

    get_new_name()

    Function to get new file names

    get_new_name_quarto()

    Function to get new file names, Quarto version

    get_solution_chunks()

    Function to label the solution chunks correctly

    get_version_chunks()

    Gets version tag information from chunks This function extracts the chunks ``` Helper for version()

    get_version_text()

    Gets version tag information from text This function extracts the sections %%% Helper for version()

    prep_orig_text()

    Function to eliminate all calls to versions() and setup chunks #' Helper for version()

    version_cleaner()

    Function to clean the different versions.

    versions()

    Knit different versions of a file from chunk and section options

    versions_multilingual()

    Knit different versions of a file from chunk and section options

    versions_quarto_multilingual()

    Knit different versions of a file from chunk and section options

    write_version()

    Function to write the different versions.

    write_version_quarto()

    Function to write the different versions.
